name: Creative Death for Stickman
description:
Bring the dead back to life to kill more!!

Remember the rule of Death, do not let a stickman see another stickman die!

The story begins with the scared stickmen in mthe cafeteria, News Room and mortuary room⋯

In this new cool point and click puzzle game you can control the weather, light them on fire...

See how the story unfolds⋯!
